�Hugar�


   "Computer so me a map of this world and tell me the history of it."  
Hugar ask the computer while he takes a seat in the chair.

   "Well, this world is called Earth, the third planet from the sun. It was 
created in the earth year of ........(You don't want to listen to it.)" The 
computer says as it brings up the map of the world.

   All of a sudden Hugar fried memory circuit repaired and he had a 
flashback of his history.  How he is a Maximal Plant(Undercover Officer.)  
He remmembers how his name is Hugar and he remmember how much he hates 
Predacons.

   "Computer, where is the closest Maximal Base, incase I want to Kill some 
maximals. Hehe."  Hugar says as he thinks of a plan to get to this base.

   "The closest maximal base is the element(I am using the world map so if 
it is out of date or something its not my fault.) It is in Africa.
